text: @realDonaldTrump 111,723 Americans are dead of the coronavirus due to your genocidal incompetence but all you do is waste another day Tweeting out nonsense and watching TV!  The thousands of people protesting outside the @WhiteHouse are  5X as big as those during your Inauguration! RESIGN NOW! https://t.co/oMD1a6G8jY
